page.title: 15Weston Park Middle School
page.content: Weston Park Middle is situated on the huge Weston Estate.The site has extensive grounds mainly grass football,hockey and cricket pitches.We share the site with a girl comprehen- sive school. Our school is the largest in the city with 500 pupils. The day is divided between academic and non academic lessons,computers,videos,photography and slide films are used as well as books and writing materials.We have a music/drama room with many musical instruments.There is a community swimming pool on the site so 95% of the children can swim.We are developing the immediate area as a conservation site with a pond and wild life habitats.Our studies include visits,daytrips and residential to the Isle of Wight,France,Wales,Dorset etc.
